objective: Fix PowerShell profile parsing errors and keep improvements stable.
constraints: Do not push or merge; only commit locally and create PR via tool
No PowerShell available in container for runtime tests
decisions: Rename Import-ProfileModuleByName parameter to ModuleName to avoid $Name parsing issues
Use format strings for module load warnings to avoid variable-colon parsing issues

next_steps: Run profile in a real PowerShell session to validate module availability
